name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-timeline-component
title: Timeline Component for Canvas apps
shortDescription: A Canvas app version of the timeline feature in a Model-Driven app, this component consolidates all the activities of a contact or account in a single timleine view, just like an MDA.
longDescription: This timeline component collects Notes, Emails, Appointments, Phone Calls and Tasks created as activities for a contact or account and displays them in a single timeline view, similar to the timeline feature in Model-Driven apps. The component is designed to be used in a Canvas app, and it can be customised to fit your specific needs and include addtiional activity tables.
